Katalog Gesamtpreis (zzgl. Steuern): This period will be used as the default expiration time period for quotes. It can be changed for any quote.

Catalog Total Price (Excl. Tax): Separate each file extension with a comma. Special symboles like dots, converted commas, asterisk, etc. are not allowed.
Katalog Gesamtpreis (zzgl. Steuern): Separate each file extension with a comma. Special symboles like dots, converted commas, asterisk, etc. are not allowed.

Catalog Total Price (Excl. Tax): File size in MB. Note that this setting can be overridden by the server settings.
Katalog Gesamtpreis (zzgl. Steuern): File size in MB. Note that this setting can be overridden by the server settings.

Catalog Total Price (Excl. Tax): Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.
